summary: This document contains financial records related to Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank, detailing account balances, transactions, and asset allocations as of January 31, 2019. It includes information on cash management, income, and various financial instruments held in the account.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary account holder at Deutsche Bank, with detailed financial records provided for his account.

events.title: Account Summary
events.description: Summary of Jeffrey Epstein's account balances and transactions for January 2019.

keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account balance as of January 31, 2019, totaling $51,443.98.
It includes a breakdown of cash management and investment income for the account.
Stewart Oldfield is identified as the primary officer managing Epstein's account.
Arthur Tendler is noted as the custody officer for the account.
The document contains various disclaimers regarding the accuracy and valuation of the financial information presented.
